Rob Lowe and his sons Matthew and John stopped by The Tonight Show on Monday to play the ` ` Best Son Challenge,'' a parent - son version of ` ` The Newlywed Game.'' ` ` Don't embarrass me,'' Rob told his two sons as Fallon explained the rules of the game. The first question was pretty easy for the boys, who were meant to guess the correct answer as Rob answered alongside them. ` ` If Rob could only watch one movie for the rest of his life, what would it be?''
